definition: square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively

sentences.english: Radar data gridding and cinrad mosaic has significance in meteorological service.
sentences.chinese: 雷達資料的網格化及拼圖在氣象業務中有重要的意義。

sentences.english: Meshes with vertex colors, normals and one or two UV sets.
sentences.chinese: 網格模型包含頂點顏色，法線，一到兩個uv集。

sentences.english: In this tutorial we will use the 960 Grid System.
sentences.chinese: 在本教程中，我們將使用960網格系統。

sentences.english: This paper presents a new fast gridding method of the dynamic blocking.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹一種動態分塊的快速網格化方法。

sentences.english: The grid shimmers with " current" or grid flux.
sentences.chinese: 網格以“湧流”或網格流動變化輕輕震顫着。

sentences.english: The grid shimmers with " current" or grid flux.
sentences.chinese: 網格以“湧流”或網格流動變化輕輕震顫着。

sentences.english: Body-fitted hexahedron grid was obtained of high speed train head surface based on mapping approach.
sentences.chinese: 利用映射法生成高速列車頭部流場的六面體貼體網格。

sentences.english: Based on Teds paving method, algorithm for generating high quality meshes of quadrilateral elements from arbitrary 2-D geometry is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了任意二維區域的全四邊形網格生成的鋪砌法。

sentences.english: A kind of Boolean operational method based on a three-dimensional grid model was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種基於三維網格模型的布爾運算方法。

sentences.english: Mesh simplification is one of the most important methods for solving the above problems.
sentences.chinese: 網格模型簡化是解決上述問題的主要方法之一。

sentences.english: Grid provides an infrastructure that you turn it on and off as needed.
sentences.chinese: 可以根據需要打開和關閉網格提供的基礎設施。

sentences.english: At the grid level we can go further than that.
sentences.chinese: 在網格級別我們可以做得更深入一些。

sentences.english: This paper introduced a density grid-based data stream clustering algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種基於密度網格的數據流聚類算法。

sentences.english: Draw textured with overlaid lightmap resolution grid.
sentences.chinese: 繪製帶有覆蓋光照貼圖分辨率網格紋理。

sentences.english: By default, all the columns in the query are displayed in the grid.
sentences.chinese: 在默認情況下，查詢的所有列均顯示在網格中。

sentences.english: Select the Timeline drop-down list. You can choose sorting mode for the network grid here.
sentences.chinese: 選擇時間線列表，你能選擇網絡網格的排序模式。

definition: vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
to rotate (about an axis)/to revolve/to turn/to move in a circle/to gyrate
surface of the body/periphery of the body/body thermometer/(literary) a person's appearance
